prompts: Create a powerful steel-type Pokemon with a fierce look and a metallic body.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a giant snake made of steel with glowing red eyes.
Generate a serpentine creature with impressive armor plating and sharp features.
Make a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, featuring dark grey and silver colors.
Imagine a Pokemon with a unique blend of mechanical and organic traits, perfect for battles.
Design a fearsome steel-type Pokemon that has a serpentine body and intimidating spikes.
Show me a Pokemon that has an imposing presence, with a sleek design and sharp edges.
